snippet.title: the earth is a better person than me
snippet.description:
the earth is a better person than me is a visual novel following a young woman, Delphine, who runs away from her life and into a forest. She realizes she can talk to the earth around her: the moon about love, dirt about death, a tree about desire. Each path unearths a different aspect of Delphine's life.

The game has 6 main paths and 16 endings.

PLAY:
itch.io:  https://karastone.itch.io/the-earth-is-a-better-person-than-me 
steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/959710/the_earth_is_a_better_person_than_me/
